must: Invite anyone you think would enjoy this and get along
may: Ride a bike or scooter or other person-powered vehicle
Come to as many or few bars as you like (do not feel obligated to come to all of them!)
Drink whatever you want, alcohol or no
not: Drink and drive. If you're planning on having more than one (1) beer, do not drive. I don't care what you think your tolerance is.
